title: Echo Technologist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is straight forward. They give you time to give clear concise answers and listen to what you have to say. The scan interview was an opportunity to showcase my skills of the heart anatomy and usage of the ultrasound machine.
Interview Questions: Name a time that you had to prioritize the patient load?

title: Student Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Panel interviews and they talk amongst who is gonna hire who. which is unfair if a student wants a chance. It’s almost like an auction for who wants which student.
Interview Questions: Where do I see myself in 5 years

title: Cardiac Sonographer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was from a peer standpoint. They each gave me questions to answer and adequate time to convey any feelings or thoughts toward the subject. The scan interview helped me showcase my optimization skills and knowledge of the ultrasound machine.
Interview Questions: Name a time that you directly affected the outcome of patient care?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare
Interview Descriptions:
Simple and straightforward. Important they find the right “fit” for the culture. Peer approval required. I really liked that piece of appreciation for their current staff. 

2 parts, one initial interview then a peer interview.
Interview Questions: How do you handle multi tasking and high stress environment?

title: Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare (Greenwood, SC) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very professional. They got right to the point, but didn't make anything awkward. Their COVID-19 protocols were in place the entire time of the interview.  I felt very welcomed. I always hate the peer review questions, but they did ask those.
Interview Questions: What would you bring to the team?

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: After applying online and waiting and calling for couple of months then I got an interview with the nurse headhunter and after her then I got sent to the floor they wanted me to work on that one that I applied for however I do like the organization want to work there and then after interviewing with the nurse manager of the area , Then you had to go before a review board of coworkers that work on this in the same area when he passed all you got the job.
Interview Questions: , Then you had to go before a review board of coworkers that work on this in the same area when he passed all you got the job.

title: RN, Bsn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare (Greenwood, SC) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: First you interview with recruiter , then manager then staff they all have a set of questions . Mostly professional but not nerve racking .  The peer interview was the best , it allows you to meet people from the department and ask them questions.
Interview Questions: Name a time where you had to resolve an issue at work with a coworker?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Completed online application. Received a call for first interview with the director of the floor then interviewed with other nurses from the floor in a peer interview. Going to ask you to give specific examples of a time when...type of questions.
Interview Questions: Do you feel its ok to break policy and procedure or have you ever broken policy and procedure?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare (Greenwood, SC) in Nov 2010
Interview Descriptions: I filled out an application and called for interview by Nursing Adm.  Was then interviewed by the nurse manager and assistant.  My perception was that it was a very friendly work enviorment with a lot of support, I was very wrong.

title: Supervisor/Ancillary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Self Regional Healthcare (Greenwood, SC) in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions: Applied on website, called for interview, called for a peer interview, hired ... then it took almost a month to actually start. It takes FOREVER to get started at this place.
